=============== =========== ===========================
Subkey          Default     Options                    
=============== =========== ===========================
SMOTE           True, False Boolean(s)                 
SMOTE_ratio     1, 0        Two Integers: loc and scale
SMOTE_neighbors 5, 15       Two Integers: loc and scale
Oversampling    False       Boolean(s)                 
=============== =========== ===========================
